name: Drifter's Crystal Marrow
desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Flame-Forged Insight."
At first glance, it's just like any old mineral you might find throughout Natlan, but due to differences in local geology, even the same type of rock can have slight differences in Stonemarrow that can only be uncovered upon closer inspection. That's why the travelers who once wandered through Natlan collected this mineral â€” some things need to be held in the palm of the hand before you can appreciate their uniqueness.

value.text:
Version 5.8 Event - Sunspray Summer Resort
Event Rewards - Painted Summer Gift

value.name: Flame-Forged Insight
value.desc: Tribal tales tell of a great blade forged by the People of the Springs to protect a child who would embark on a distant journey. This particular weapon appears to be a replica of that legendary sword.
